greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n-1} 8^k*B(k)*binomial(n,k) where B(k) is the k-th Bernoulli number.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..432
mathematica: Range[0, 15]! CoefficientList[ Series[ 8x/(1 + Exp[x] + Exp[ 2x] + Exp[ 3x] + Exp[ 4x] + Exp[ 5x] + Exp[ 6x] + Exp[ 7x]), {x, 0, 15}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 26 2012 *)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, May 31 2003
